presentations.S0665L03: The Spanish for 'to go', as in 'Do you all want to go?', is: ... 'ir' ... 'ir'
presentations.S0666L01: The Spanish for 'what', as in 'What do you all think?', is: ... 'qué' ... 'qué'
presentations.S0666L02: The Spanish for 'you all', as in 'What do you all think?', is: ... 'todos ustedes' ... 'todos ustedes' - {target1}'todos' means all, {target1}'ustedes' means you
presentations.S0666L03: The Spanish for 'think', as in 'What do you all think?', is: ... 'piensan' ... 'piensan'
presentations.S0666L04: The Spanish for 'what do you think', as in 'What do you all think?', is: ... 'qué piensan' ... 'qué piensan' - {target1}'qué' means what, {target1}'piensan' means think
presentations.S0667L01: The Spanish for 'do you mind', as in 'Do you all mind?', is: ... 'les importa' ... 'les importa' - {target1}'les' means to you, {target1}'importa' means matters/mind
presentations.S0667L02: The Spanish for 'to you all', as in 'Do you all mind?', is: ... 'a todos ustedes' ... 'a todos ustedes' - {target1}'a' means to, {target1}'todos' means all, {target1}'ustedes' means you
presentations.S0668L01: The Spanish for 'I hope', as in 'I hope you'll all be able to go', is: ... 'espero' ... 'espero'
presentations.S0668L02: The Spanish for 'I hope that', as in 'I hope you'll all be able to go', is: ... 'espero que' ... 'espero que' - {target1}'espero' means I hope, {target1}'que' means that
presentations.S0668L03: The Spanish for 'you all can', as in 'I hope you'll all be able to go', is: ... 'todos ustedes puedan' ... 'todos ustedes puedan' - {target1}'todos' means all, {target1}'ustedes' means you, {target1}'puedan' means can/be able to
presentations.S0668L04: The Spanish for 'be able to go', as in 'I hope you'll all be able to go', is: ... 'puedan ir' ... 'puedan ir' - {target1}'puedan' means can/be able to, {target1}'ir' means to go
presentations.S0668L05: The Spanish for 'able to go', as in 'I hope you'll all be able to go', is: ... 'puedan ir' ... 'puedan ir'
